mapper.select: select ps.pid AS pid, ps.pname AS pname, p.category AS category, p.category2 AS category2, p.name AS name, p.name2 AS name2, p.price AS price, p.startdate AS startdate, p.enddate AS enddate, p.stock AS stock, p.iok AS iok from products p FULL OUTER JOIN psale ps ON p.pid = ps.pid
mapper.update: UPDATE products SET iok=#{iok} WHERE pid=#{pid}
